friendship.views.accept_invatation(request)[source]¶

This function will redirect the URL of my-invites-view. This function will save the sender and receiver profile if the status is accepted.

Parameters

  • name – request - it generates the response(HTTP)

  • type – HttpResponse

returns an URL

This function will redirect the my_invites page.If profile = request user then add the profile in invite list.
